summary: A woman is raped by 3 men. She moves south to Tokyo and 5 years later is about to marry a colleague, when one of the rapists enters her apartment. The other 2 come later.
cast: Harumi Inoue|Shingo Tsurumi|Kazuki Kitamura|Shunsuke Matsuoka|Daisuke Iijima|Yôzaburô Itô|Ken Nakayama|Kyoko Muramatsu|Satsuki Natsukawa|Takeko Kubota|Kyôko Hayami|Naoto Takenaka|Ruben Arvizu|Bob Buchholz|Elvia Gaitan|Dave Mallow|Bob Papenbrook|Debbie Rothstein|Ellyn Stern|Charles Stevenson|Doug Stone|Dan Woren
title: Furîzu mî
